install.name: os_creditcard
install.title: Offline Credit Card Processing
install.author: Giang Dinh Truong
install.description: This payment plugin collects the Credit Card information from customers and send it to administrator for offline processing.

field.name: icon
field.label: Icon
field.description: If you want to show icon instead of payment method title on checkout, upload it to media/com_eshop/payments folder and enter the name of the file here. For example os_creditcard.png

field.name: payment_fee
field.label: Payment Fee (Fixed amount)
field.description: Enter a fixed amount of payment fee.

field.name: payment_fee_percentage
field.label: Payment Fee (Percentage)
field.description: Enter a number of percentage of Sub Total as payment fee.

field.name: payment_fee_min_total
field.label: Payment Fee Minimum Total
field.description: Enter minimum of Total before Payment Fee is removed.

field.name: min_total
field.label: Minimum Total
field.description: If you enter a Minimum Total value, then Offline Credit Card Payment plugin is only available if Order Total greater than Minimum Total.

field.name: max_total
field.label: Maximum Total
field.description: If you enter a Maximum Total value, then Offline Credit Card Payment plugin is only available if Order Total less than Maximum Total.

field.name: customer_groups
field.label: Customer Groups
field.description: Choose the customer groups to apply Offline Credit Card Payment method.

field.name: disabled_products
field.label: Disabled Products
field.description: Choose disabled products here. If the cart includes at least a disabled product, then the Offline Credit Card Payment method option will be not available.
